verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Salvation belongs to our God
Who sits upon the throne,
And unto the Lamb
Be praise and glory,
Wisdom and thanks
Honour and power and strength

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be to our God
Forever and ever,
Be to our God
Forever and ever,
Be to our God
Forever and ever, amen.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And we, the redeemed, shall be strong
In purpose and unity,
Declaring aloud
Praise and glory,
Wisdom and thanks,
Honour and power and strength

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be to our God
Forever and ever,
Be to our God
Forever and ever,
Be to our God
Forever and ever, amen.
